results.overview: Dr. Victor Frankenstein, a brilliant but egotistical scientist, brings a creature to life in a monstrous experiment that ultimately leads to the undoing of both the creator and his tragic creation.
results.title: Frankenstein

results.overview: Henry Frankenstein pieces together body parts in the hope of bringing a human-like creature to life. The mad scientistâ€™s dreams are shattered by his monstrous creation awakening with rage to a world that hates and fears him.
